version_description:
• Extended TOTP support
• Improved VoiceOver accessibility
• A few minor bug fixes and improvements

• Extended TOTP support
• Improved VoiceOver accessibility
• A few minor bug fixes and improvements

Added:
∙In-app announcements about the AppStore release and early-bird promo
∙Associated the app with keepassium.com domain, to allow auto-filling master passwords from Keychain
∙Detection whether running in TestFlight (beta) or App Store (produc

∙Associated the app with keepassium.com domain, to allow auto-filling master passwords from Keychain
∙Detection whether running in TestFlight (beta) or App Store (produc

Added:
∙ iOS 13 dark mode
∙ German translation [thanks, Lukas Wolfsteiner and @cpktmpkt]
∙ Dutch translation [thanks, Heimen Stoffels]
∙ Chinese Simplified and Traditional translations [thanks, 3374575857]
∙ Russian translation [self]

Added:
∙ iOS 13 dark mode
∙ German translation [thanks, Lukas Wolfsteiner and @cpktmpkt]
∙ Dutch translation [thanks, Heimen Stoffels]
∙ Chinese Simplified and Traditional translations [thanks, 3374575857]

Added:
◆ Swedish translation [thanks, Patrik Thunström]
◆ Czech translation [thanks, Tomáš Piešťanský, Marcel Piestansky, and Radek Weis]
◆ If current database is inaccessible due to new iOS 13 permissions, the app will suggest to re-add the data

Added:
◆ Swedish translation [thanks, Patrik Thunström]
◆ Czech translation [thanks, Tomáš Piešťanský, Marcel Piestansky, and Radek Weis]
◆ If current database is inaccessible due to new iOS 13 permissions, the app will suggest to re-add the data

Added:
◆ KeePassium Pro edition, compatible with Family Sharing

Fixed:
◆ On iPadOS 13, the app showed an empty screen
◆ Search bar did not autofocus in AutoFill (iOS 13) [thanks, tunger]
◆ Premium Upgrade screen was not available to pr

Added:
◆ KeePassium Pro edition, compatible with Family Sharing

Fixed:
◆ On iPadOS 13, the app showed an empty screen
◆ Search bar did not autofocus in AutoFill (iOS 13) [thanks, tunger]
◆ Premium Upgrade screen was not available to pr

◆ Added Spanish translation
◆ Default Database Timeout is now Never instead of 1 hour
◆ Improved support of larger font sizes
◆ Other bug fixes and improvements

◆ Added Spanish translation
◆ Default Database Timeout is now Never instead of 1 hour
◆ Improved support of larger font sizes
◆ Other bug fixes and improvements

This verison fixes two serious issues on iOS 13:
• Fixed: AppLock did not always work on iOS 13.2 [thanks, loblawbob]
• Fixed: With passcode-only AppLock, database list flashed visible on launch [thanks, Joseph]

And a few other things:
• A

This verison fixes two serious issues on iOS 13:
• Fixed: AppLock did not always work on iOS 13.2 [thanks, loblawbob]
• Fixed: With passcode-only AppLock, database list flashed visible on launch [thanks, Joseph]

And a few other things:
• A

• Improved: Unlock button be gone! Auto-unlock databases whenever possible.
• Improved: AutoFill will automatically select the only entry [thanks, Igor]
• Improved: added a confirmation dialog when locking database manually [thanks, Tim]
• Fixed:

• Improved: Unlock button be gone! Auto-unlock databases whenever possible.
• Improved: AutoFill will automatically select the only entry [thanks, Igor]
• Improved: added a confirmation dialog when locking database manually [thanks, Tim]
• Fixed:

Highlights:
• Added: moving items between groups
• Fixed: freezing at "Loading... 0%"

Detailed changes:

• Added: Move/copy groups and entries to other groups
• Added: Long-press menu for files, groups and entries
• Added: Highli

Highlights:
• Added: moving items between groups
• Fixed: freezing at "Loading... 0%"

Detailed changes:

• Added: Move/copy groups and entries to other groups
• Added: Long-press menu for files, groups and entries
• Added: Highli

• Added: YubiKey support!

Compatible with KeePassXC. Works with NFC-capable keys (e.g. YubiKey 5 NFC) and compatible devices (iPhone 7 or later, iOS 13+).

(Support for YubiKey 5Ci is coming soon)

• Added: YubiKey support!

Compatible with KeePassXC. Works with NFC-capable keys (e.g. YubiKey 5 NFC) and compatible devices (iPhone 7 or later, iOS 13+).

(Support for YubiKey 5Ci is coming soon)

• Added: When importing a database, the app will ask whether to overwrite the existing file [thanks, everyone]
• Added: New setting - whether AutoFill should auto-proceed when there is only one suitable entry [thanks, Nicolai]
• Added: French transl

• Added: When importing a database, the app will ask whether to overwrite the existing file [thanks, everyone]
• Added: New setting - whether AutoFill should auto-proceed when there is only one suitable entry [thanks, Nicolai]
• Added: French transl

• Fixed: custom field changes sometimes were not saved [thanks, Michael]
• Fixed: progress bar sometimes appeared misplaced [thanks, Michael]
• Updated CZ/FR/SV localizations

• Fixed: custom field changes sometimes were not saved [thanks, Michael]
• Fixed: progress bar sometimes appeared misplaced [thanks, Michael]
• Updated CZ/FR/SV localizations

• Added: Free trial for premium subscriptions
• Added: Automatic backup of the latest opened database version
• Added: "Exclude from iCloud/iTunes backup" option for local files
• Added: Customizable app icon
• Added: Japanese translation [tha

• Added: Automatic backup of the latest opened database version
• Added: "Exclude from iCloud/iTunes backup" option for local files
• Added: Customizable app icon

• Added: Perpetual fallback license for subscriptions (rent-to-own license)
• Added: App history screen (What's New)

• Improved: the search is now insensitive to diacritics, unless you use diacritics in the search text. (For example, "hello" wou

1.15

• Added: Perpetual fallback license for subscriptions (rent-to-own license)
• Added: App history screen (What's New)

• Improved: the search is now insensitive to diacritics, unless you use diacritics in the search text. (For example,

• Refined: (iOS 14) Suggesting to re-add the database if it seems missing.
• Refined: Keeping the .latest backup file regardless of its age
• Refined: Added a Copy button to Caller ID in AutoFill [thanks, Adam]
• Refined: Showing a wait animation

• Refined: (iOS 14) Suggesting to re-add the database if it seems missing.
• Refined: Keeping the .latest backup file regardless of its age
• Refined: Added a Copy button to Caller ID in AutoFill [thanks, Adam]
• Refined: Showing a wait animation

• Added: [Premium] Express unlock using the stored decryption key. This also allows opening YubiKey-protected databases in AutoFill.

• Refined: Free version won't count broken databases towards the free DB limit
• Refined: Add Stratospherix File

• Added: [Premium] Express unlock using the stored decryption key. This also allows opening YubiKey-protected databases in AutoFill.

• Refined: Free version won't count broken databases towards the free DB limit
• Refined: Add Stratospherix File

1.19

- Improved: Enabled express unlock in the free version.
- Fixed: Possible database corruption on save in v1.18 [thanks, everyone]
- Fixed: URL fields not recognized on iOS 14 if default browser is not Safari [thanks, Ivo]

1.18

1.19

- Improved: Enabled express unlock in the free version.
- Fixed: Possible database corruption on save in v1.18 [thanks, everyone]
- Fixed: URL fields not recognized on iOS 14 if default browser is not Safari [thanks, Ivo]

1.18

• Added: Entry field references, resolved and displayed

• Refined: Allow unlocking databases protected only by YubiKey [thanks, Stefan]
• Refined: iOS 13+ will use system's monospaced font (SF Mono) instead of Menlo

• Fixed(partially): So

• Added: Entry field references, resolved and displayed

• Refined: Allow unlocking databases protected only by YubiKey [thanks, Stefan]
• Refined: iOS 13+ will use system's monospaced font (SF Mono) instead of Menlo

• Fixed(partially): So

• Added: Support for Argon2id and .keyx key file format (KeePass 2.47) [thanks, Dominik]
• Added: Premium subscriptions now support Family Sharing
• Added: VoiceOver: added "Copy Field" accessibility actions in group viewer [thanks, Adam]
• Added

• Added: Support for Argon2id and .keyx key file format (KeePass 2.47) [thanks, Dominik]
• Added: Premium subscriptions now support Family Sharing
• Added: VoiceOver: added "Copy Field" accessibility actions in group viewer [thanks, Adam]
